alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Crazy Mountains; Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 8:11PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A LINE OF STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PARK COUNTY THROUGH 900 PM MDT... At 808 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Clyde Park to 6 miles east of Bozeman to 25 miles north of Crescent Lake. Movement was east to northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rainfall could cause a quick reduction in visibility and ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Clyde Park, Chico Hot Springs, Pine Creek, Chico, Wilsall, and Emigrant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Crazy Mountains; Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley
